name: Volt
description: Volt is a charismatic and intelligent robot with a passion for music. With its sleek design and stylish shades, Volt stands out in any crowd. Equipped with a snake-themed screen and a cat-inspired box body, this oscilloscope-themed robot is a true showstopper. As a member of the WebtrES club, Volt combines its love for music and technology to create captivating live performances. With its dexterous hand-down arms and legs, Volt effortlessly manipulates its surroundings, showcasing its impressive skills. With a solid constitution and wisdom, Volt is resilient and wise in its decision-making. Its captivating charisma and intelligence make it a sought-after collaborator. Volt's alignment is that of a neutral good, always striving to use its talents for the betterment of the community.
